Title: Firmly keep in mind, to resolutely listen to the Party's command is the spirit of a strong army ...
Publisher: Zhongguo jiefangjun Nanjing junqu zong zhuangbei bu (中国解放军南京军区总装备部)
Notes: The full text: Firmly keep in mind, to resolutely listen to the Party's command is the spirit of a strong army; firmly keep in mind, going into battle, scoring a victory is the essence of a strong army; firmly keep in mind, to legally and strictly command an army is the foundation of a strong army.From a series devoted to the PRC military, published by the PLA General Armament Department of the Nanjing Military Region and intended for internal (内部) use only.
